name: slice::sort::stable::drift::logical_merge

ops::index::IndexMut::index_mut.doc:
Performs the mutable indexing (`container[index]`) operation.

 # Panics

 May panic if the index is out of bounds.

slice::sort::stable::merge::merge.doc:
Merges non-decreasing runs `v[..mid]` and `v[mid..]` using `scratch` as
 temporary storage, and stores the result into `v[..]`.
